name: Seymour High School's Lost & Found
description:
Seymour High School's Lost & Found

You've volunteered to run Seymour High School's Lost and Found for an afternoon! Lucky you! In the beginning, you will sort the objects into boxes by dragging and dropping them. Sort them based on whatever makes sense to you - the goal is to be able to find items quickly as people give you hints about what they've lost. Once all of the items have been sorted, people will start coming and asking for their items. The faster you get all of the people their items, the better!

Created for the St. Louis Global Game Jam 2021 by wherbig, jango2106, and ahoopes16

Source code: https://github.com/ahoopes16/ggj2021

Attributions:

  • Mellau - Button click sounds
  • music by 2mello from the album after midnight: unaired broadcasts; licensed under CC3.0
  • cassette tape SFX sourced from https://shapeforms.itch.io/cassette
  • font is Hachi Maru Pop sourced from Google Fonts under the OFL
